price: Respondieron: "No, pero es lo que adoraban nuestros padres [y nosotros simplemente los imitamos]".
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
